Ambition...NO SPOILERS REVIEWThis game is devastating\, I don't think there is a word that describes it better.As a fan of the first The Last of Us and Uncharted series\, I've been devasted to see what direction naughty dog has taken to drive the narrative of this game\, I was afraid it wouldn't work.It's the most ambitious and the least fun game that the studio ever has created.Ambition... That word is accurate when you look at the scope\, volume\, and polish of this game\, but unfortunately\, that is not what I mean.The narrative that this game is trying to sell is devilishly difficult to pull off. As you see by review bombing it's not one that everyone will get.For me\, it worked\, and I'm astonished it did!I think that everyone who called this game a hot piece of garbage regards the story stayed closed for what that game has to offer.It forces you to grow as a person and a player\, you will resist and you won't like it.But if you stay open it will change you.I never felt so many strong emotions playing a video game\, part I did it as well\, but there was light.Part II is not afraid to leave you in darkness\, by doing so it is a much richer experience.So should you play it?No - If you liked part I\, you think it was a perfect end to this story and want to leave this universe with a sense of accomplishment and closure.Yes - if you are not afraid to be dragged through hell ride of fear\, pain\, excitement\, and sadness.AND CAN STAY OPEN FOR THOSE EMOTIONSIt is worth it.… Expand
